name: interprovincial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between different provinces (= areas of a country): Both local and interprovincial services operate from this station. They won the interprovincial championship five times between 2009 and 2013.
More examplesFewer examplesThey urged the government to reject the controversial interprovincial trade agreement.She presented data showing the interprovincial differences in the use of the youth justice system.Removing interprovincial trade barriers would lower costs and encourage investment.The first inter-provincial hurling match took place in 1896 between Leinster and Munster.Ulster won the inter-provincial table tennis tournament, beating Leinster to take the title.
